10.title: A WHALE OF A CATEGORY
clues: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew in Cape Cod, Massachusetts)  Long used by whalers, this 3-word phrase lets others know a whale has been spotted

This whale's scientific name, Monodon monoceros, refers to its unusually long left tooth
